snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel denounced the new president of Iran, Hassan Rouhani, saying Iran’s actions belied his soothing talk.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu seeks to dismantle credibility of Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani, using his annual speech at United Nations to cast him as untrustworthy and to press international community to keep up sanctions to prevent Iran from building nuclear bomb.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel denounced the new president of Iran, Hassan Rouhani, saying Iran’s actions belied his soothing talk.

headline.main: Israeli Leader Excoriates New President of Iran
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Excoriates Iran’s Leader and His ‘Charm Offensive’
